products.title: Splash Blackout Linear Stem Silver  Roller Blind
products.description: The iconic linear stem design from orla kiely is a contemporary twist on one of her most iconic designs, the minimalist edge of the pattern harmonising perfectly with modern interiors. Here the pattern is cast in a simple bright white against a steely grey background, gatherin the iconic linear stem design from orla kiely is a contemporary twist on one of her most iconic designs, the minimalist edge of the pattern harmonising perfectly with modern interiors.

products.title: Splash Blackout Tiny Stem Taupe Roller Blind
products.description: Bring a sense of earthy warmth to your bathroom, alongside some cheerfully charming style, with this splash tiny stem taupe roller blind. The rich and creamy taupe fabric is packed with signature orla kiely style, her iconic stem pattern shrunk down to a cute scale that adds d bring a sense of earthy warmth to your bathroom, alongside some cheerfully charming style, with this splash tiny stem taupe roller blind.

products.title: Splash Blackout Scribble Duck Egg Roller Blind
products.description: Sometimes less is more, and this straightforwardly beautiful roller from their orla kiely collection is a great example of that. The delightfully abstract scribble pattern has the effect of giving the blind a sense of texture, perfect for texturising a clean, bright bathroom spa sometimes less is more, and this straightforwardly beautiful roller from their orla kiely collection is a great example of that.

products.title: Splash Blackout Linear Stem Duck Egg Roller Blind
products.description: Bring some retro style to your bathroom with this cool-as-a-cucumber roller from their orla kiely house collection. The soft shade is the perfect way to inject some brightness and a cooling tone, and that instantly recognisable pattern adds the funky chic that orla kiely is know bring some retro style to your bathroom with this cool-as-a-cucumber roller from their orla kiely house collection.

products.title: Aguas Linen Splash Blue Roman Blind
products.description: With a pattern resembling a watercolour landscape rendered in dark and blue hues, this beautiful roman blind is thoroughly modern-looking and artistic. The presence of darker tones masks the blue enough that the effect is neutral and easy to match, but strong and bold enough with a pattern resembling a watercolour landscape rendered in dark and blue hues, this beautiful roman blind is thoroughly modern-looking and artistic.

products.title: Splash Blackout Beach Huts Mineral Roller Blind
products.description: If you love to be beside the seaside, then the splash blackout beach hut mineral roller blind is the perfect choice for you. Featuring beautifully drawn beach huts and pastel tones, this charming design is inspired by the british seaside and makes you dream of summer. The swee if you love to be beside the seaside, then the splash blackout beach hut mineral roller blind is the perfect choice for you.

products.title: Splash Blackout Spike Mist Roller Blind
products.description: Wish you could have a touch of scion fun in every room in the house? Well you can. This splash spike mist roller blind was born for bathrooms and kitchens, thanks to the completely waterproof fabric and sweet design. It's blackout too, giving you all the privacy you need. Endles wish you could have a touch of scion fun in every room in the house? Well you can.

products.title: Splash Blackout Samaki Aqua Roller Blind
products.description: If youre looking for something that speaks fun and brings a whole lot of personality to your bathroom, then this splash samaki aqua roller blind is a fine choice. Schools of textured fish swim so happily in sync here, and the gorgeous green colourway was just made for bath if youre looking for something that speaks fun and brings a whole lot of personality to your bathroom, then this splash samaki aqua roller blind is a fine choice.
